overview:
Doug brings 20 years experience developing, producing, licensing and distributing television and rich media content. Doug has held senior positions at Cerebellum Corporation, New River Media, and Films for the Humanities and Sciences. He has served a client list which includes Microsoft Corporation, Clear Channel Entertainment Television, Conde Nast Publications, Fountain Mobile, Digital Cinema Solutions, Educate, Inc., Roadtrip Nation and Look-Look, a youth research and marketing firm.

Source: WineTastetv.com
